### [choco://windows-10-update-assistant](choco://windows-10-update-assistant)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

## Get the Windows 10 2022 Update | Version 22H2 now 

The Windows 10 Update Assistant can help you update to the latest version of Windows 10.

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/windows-10-update-assistant/readme.md)**
	

---

**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**

---
summary: Windows 10 Update Assistant downloads and starts the setup for Windows 10 version 21H2
author: Microsoft
